title: FREE HEXTECH LOOT
body:
So i was playing on a smurf very excited for my FREE hextech chest loot at level 5 , finish my game. hit level 5.
BOOM
Nothing.
I get no free chest + free key, was it made to give the free loot to players level 5+ During the release not after? someone explain please, thanks.

replies.body: Did you by any chance receive the 400RP upon hitting level 3?
No i did not, why is that?
The free RP reward no longer exists, it was replaced with the hextech chest.

Hey there,

I followed this up with one of the Rioters and from what they can tell you received your chest roughly the same time this thread was made.

You probably just missed it, take another look in your hextech inventory.
